                  java.lang.String channel,
                  byte[] bytes)
Description copied from interface: net.minecraft.src.forge.IPacketHandler
Called when we receive a Packet250CustomPayload for a channel that this handler is registered to.

Specified by:
onPacketData in interface net.minecraft.src.forge.IPacketHandler
Parameters:
network - The NetworkManager for the current connection.
channel - The Channel the message came on.

onLogin

void onLogin(net.minecraft.src.NetworkManager network,
             net.minecraft.src.Packet1Login login)
Description copied from interface: net.minecraft.src.forge.IConnectionHandler
Raised when you receive a Packet1Login. On the server, it is raised after the NetHandler is switched, and the initial user placement/info packets are sent. On the client, this is raised after the packet is parsed, and the user is sitting at the 'Downloading Terrain' screen.

Specified by:
onLogin in interface net.minecraft.src.forge.IConnectionHandler
Parameters:
network - The NetoworkManager associated with this connection.
login - The login packet

onDisconnect

void onDisconnect(net.minecraft.src.NetworkManager network,
                  java.lang.String message,
                  java.lang.Object[] args)
Description copied from interface: net.minecraft.src.forge.IConnectionHandler
Raised whenever the socket is closed, can be caused by various reasons.

Specified by:
onDisconnect in interface net.minecraft.src.forge.IConnectionHandler
Parameters:
network - The NetworkManager associated with this connection.
message - The translated message to be displayed for this disconnection.
args - Any additional arguments that the code may of provided. Sometimes this is further explanation, or a Throwable, in the case of errors.
